title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Flynn Responds to Senate Subpoenas (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg Law Brief: Flynn Responds to Senate Subpoenas (Audio)
description:
Andrew Wright, a professor at the Savannah Law School, and Renato Mariotti, a partner at Thompson Coburn, discuss senate subpoenas for former national security adviser Michael Flynn and Donald Trump’s personal lawyer, Michael Cohen. They speak with June Grasso and Michael Best on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
